page.description: Gets a list of files in a directory in the file system of the mobile device.

argument.name: dirName
argument.description: Name of directory to get a list of files from.

argument.name: onComplete
argument.description: A javascript function to call if reading the directory succeeds.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function to call if an error occurs when trying to read the directory.

page.discussion: The phoneGapGetDirectoryRecurse method gets a list of files in a directory in the file system of the mobile device. Recurses into sub-directories that are found. The method is asynchronous. Calls the onComplete function if the method succeeded. Calls the onError function is the method failed.
